author: John Hayward, John Hayward
title: China Disappears Order for Communist Party to Screen Coronavirus Research
description: A directive from the Chinese government posted on the websites of numerous universities and research institutions instructed them to submit all academic papers on the Wuhan coronavirus to Communist Party officials for review, Radio Free Asia revealed on Tuesd…
content: A directive from the Chinese government posted on the websites of numerous universities and research institutions instructed them to submit all academic papers on the Wuhan coronavirus to Communist Party officials for review, Radio Free Asia (RFA) revealed on… [+4074 chars]
